scripts.generate: pnpm api:bundle && pnpm generate:backend:api-models && pnpm generate:definitions:internal && pnpm generate:client:ioweb-function
scripts.generate:definitions:internal: shx rm -rf src/generated/definitions/internal && shx mkdir -p src/generated/definitions/internal && gen-api-models --api-spec ./api/index.yaml --no-strict --out-dir ./src/generated/definitions/internal
scripts.generate:backend:api-models: shx rm -rf src/generated/backend && shx mkdir -p src/generated/backend && gen-api-models --strict 0 --api-spec https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pagopa/io-backend/v7.28.0/api_backend.yaml --out-dir ./src/generated/backend
scripts.generate:client:ioweb-function: shx rm -rf src/generated/definitions/ioweb-function && shx mkdir -p ./src/generated/definitions/ioweb-function && gen-api-models --api-spec https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pagopa/io-auth-n-identity-domain/9441425b7f680bd35d5ca6687010b332e5b73adc/apps/io-web-profile/api/internal.yaml --no-strict --out-dir ./src/generated/definitions/ioweb-function --request-types --response-decoders --client
scripts.bump:api: bundle-api-spec -i api/index.yaml -o api/index.yaml -V $npm_package_version && git add api/index.yaml
